channel.title: The Hero With a Thousand Faces on
channel.description: Recent content in The Hero With a Thousand Faces on

item.title: Myth and Dream
item.description:
By the sacrilege of the refusal of the rite, however, the individual cut himself as a unit off from the larger unit of the whole community

The hero is the man of self-achieved submission, …only birth can conquer death

We shall come to the center of our own existence
like the labyrinth, it’s a path of hero
